misc

misc.Rd

Miscellaneous utility functions.

.is_blank(x)

.filter_geneset(gs, min_size)

.emptyBOWER(...)

.create_graph(snn, mode = "undirected", weighted = TRUE, ...)

.graph_to_data(gr, ...)

.closest_to_centroid(data, x_column, y_column, n = 1, id_column = NULL)

.typecheck(sce, mode, sce_assay = "logcounts", seurat_assay = "RNA")

.makeRankGeneList(
  deg,
  gene_symbol,
  logfoldchanges,
  pvals,
  remove_mito_ribo = TRUE
)

range01(x)

.retrieve_gsea(res, query)

.read_geneset(x, ...)

Arguments

x

numerical vector
gs

list of vectors.
min_size

minimum size of geneset otherwise filter out.
...

passed to ggraph::ggraph.
snn

KNN graph.
mode

mode of conversion. Accepts one of AUCell, SingleCellExperiment, Seurat, scanpy.
weighted

This argument specifies whether to create a weighted graph from an adjacency matrix. If it is NULL then an unweighted graph is created and the elements of the adjacency matrix gives the number of edges between the vertices. If it is a character constant then for every non-zero matrix entry an edge is created and the value of the entry is added as an edge attribute named by the weighted argument. If it is TRUE then a weighted graph is created and the name of the edge attribute will be weight. See ?igraph::graph_from_adjacency_matrix.
gr

data matrix or data.frame that contains at least two columns.
x_column

name of x column/axis.
y_column

name of y column/axis.
n

(numeric) number of points that are close to the centroid to be detected. Default = 1.
id_column

(character or numeric) name or numeric index of the column in data containing identifiers of one or distinct sets of points. If, NULL, the default, only one set is assumed.
sce

Single cell object. Accepts either a Seurat object of SingleCellExperiment object.
sce_assay

name of assay in SingleCellExperiment object.
seurat_assay

name of assay in Seurat object.
deg

deg table. must at least have a column for gene symbol, log fold changes and pvalues.
gene_symbol

gene_symbol
logfoldchanges

logfoldchanges
pvals

pvals
remove_mito_ribo

boolean. whether or not to remove mitochondial and ribosomal genes from consideration. Default is TRUE.
res

fgsea result data.frame.
query

column name in fgsea results.

Value

appropriate single cell object for enrichment analysis

sorted ranked gene list.
